FuncDef: This command creates a template used by RADIUS-triggered mirror destinations. RADIUS provides the IP destination (and other optional attributes) for the mirror destination and the mirror template provides the remaining mirror destination attributes for mirroring packets remotely over the core of an IP network.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the template name, up to 32 characters.
Specifies the type of encapsulation supported by the mirror service. Values-ether, frame-relay, ppp, ip-only, atm-sdu, satop-e1, satop-t1, cesopsn, cesopsn-cas.
Keyword required to create a template.
